title: In-client connection issues, late joining to the lobby followed by "connection loss" pop-up
body: Okay, so since the patch Zoe was added to the live servers, I am exeperiencing a lot of connection problems and issues with the client itself. Skipping the fact that I can't see the main page for like 6 six months already, there is no session when I'm not being disconnected from the client (not the game) for at least as many matches as I choose to play. The information that client is trying to reconnect sometimes occurs randomly while using it. Unfortunately everytime I accept the match, I'm actually always last person to join the lobby. It shows up when there is like 2 secs to pick a champion I wanna play, but there again always appears "trying to reconnect" notification. It disappears after 3 secs and everything seems to be fine until the loading screen pops up. Sometimes I'm not even able to see the champion cards because "I have been disconnected, try again". But sometimes I can see those cards for like 10 secs and as soon as the game starts to load, LoL crashes and I'm able to reconnect ONLY after the match starts. There are no issues with my connection, everytime the problem occurs, every page, app, even Spotify and Twtich work perfectly. I found only one post with a problem similar to mine but you haven't responded for some reason. Thank you for your time and I hope you'll find the solution as soon as possible. If you need more information, I'm down to help.

replies.body:
Hey there, I don't recommend queuing up for now until this gets fixed up otherwise you'll run into dodge penalties or lower priority queues.  Even though your internet seems okay, it seems your network still has issues reaching specific services like matchmaking and champion select.   I highly recommend going over each step of  the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test it in a custom game.

Should this fail, grab some logs from that hextech repair tool and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look with you.

/Porobump Broporo

I've had the same issue! I haven't found a fix but i'm currently using the hextech repair tool that riot has made for league to see if it can fix the issue.

I've noticed that the loading screen is always at 0 Ping when the network error pops up.

I've tried reapir tool also, didn't help me. Reinstalling didn't work too. 
Yeah, that's true, forgot to mention that.

Even though Spotify and twitch are working, all of those issues you're having point to your network not having a super stable connection with *our* servers. Make sure you're trying an ethernet connection if possible, but do run through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to hit the most common fixes for these types of things.

{{sticker:sg-lux}} Poro Bro!
